article: Once there was a rich man in a village. He never gave anything to help  others  . The villagers didn't like him. One day he said to them, "I know you don't like me. I will give everything I have  _  you when I die. Then everyone will be happy." But nobody  believed  him. The rich man couldn't understand why they didn't believe him. One day he went for a walk by a lake. Under a big tree he happened to hear a pig and a cow  _  The pig  _  to the cow, "Why everyone likes you and nobody likes me? After I die. I provide people with pork, ham, etc. I give three or four things to them. But you give  only  one thing--milk. Why do people like you all the time and not me?" The cow said, "Look, I give them milk while I'm  _  . They see that I'm generous with what I have. But you don't give them anything before you die. You give them ham, pork and so on only after you're dead. People don't believe in the  _  ; they believe in the present. If you give something  _  you are living, people will like you. It is quite simple." From that moment on, the rich man did his  _  to help the poor.
